Description: Replaced assign() with pd.get_dummies() for better categorical encoding
Introduced StandardScaler to normalize Age and Pclass for better model performance
Optimized Logistic Regression using GridSearchCV with an improved parameter grid
Introduced ROC Curve & AUC Score to assess model performance
Increased test_size from 0.05 to 0.2 for a better validation split
Implemented basic Logistic Regression using LogisticRegression()
Applied GridSearchCV with a logarithmic range of C values
Converted Sex column into a binary Female column
Compared actual vs. predicted values in a heatmap
